title: Kan van khawpui thar nuam takah khian
lyrics:
Kan van khawpui thar nuam takah khian,
Chutah chhandamte kan intawk ang;
Kan lungngaihna a reh zo tawh ang,
Chatuan chawlhna in kan thlen hun khian.

Aw, Eden, khawpui thar,
Hmana mi aia nuam;
Chutah chatuanin kan chawl tawh ang,
Kan Lalpa khawpui siam tharah khian.

Khi van khawpui hlimna hmunah khian,
He khawvel hi kan kal pelh hunah,
Mi thianghlim thleng hmasate nen khan,
Kan Lalpa hmaah kan intawk ang.

Chutah mi thianghlim tam tak an awm,
Zawlnei, martar, chhandam apiang nen,
Naupang chhandam apiangte nen pawh,
Tunah khawpui mawiah khian an zai.

Van kawtthler rangkachaka luan nen,
Lalpa Pathian chatuana eng nen,
Angel var leh in eng ropui nen,
Chhandam apiang nen hmuh ka nghakhlel.
